name: GET THAT CRACKER OUT OF MY FACE
name_original: GET THAT CRACKER OUT OF MY FACE
description:
You have to play it in Fullscreenmode for best experience.

Drag all the crackers out of the screen to avoid the bird of getting angry.

The further you get, the harder it gets.....

I build it under 3 hours.

it was really learn full and fun to do.
